about_the_game:
Egypt, 1923. A young archaeologist discovers the gigantic tomb of an unnamed pharaoh. As she and her team descend into the tomb, it seems to come alive and closes completely, plunging them into darkness. Pharaoh has awakened from his eternal sleep, as well as his armies who impatiently await his orders.

Shadows of Duat is an old school survival horror set in Egypt. An indie game with the essence of the classics of the genre, but modern gameplay, with realistic graphics, immersive sound and over-the-shoulder view. A difficult and terrifying challenge only for the bravest.

This story takes place entirely inside a colossal Egyptian tomb full of secrets to discover, puzzles, traps, curses and spooky enemies, which you will have to face through your wits, due to the shortage of ammunition.

There are 4 main characters that you can embody: the Archaeologist, the Engineer, the Mercenary and the Sage. Each one has their own unique abilities and will allow you to experience the story from a different point of view.

The game is full of references and curiosities from Ancient Egypt, since its levels are based on the Egyptian underworld described in the Book of Gates.

In the darkness of the tomb, you must be alert to every sound, every mural or statue, which will give you clues about the dangers lurking around every corner. The tomb is alive and sometimes the same corridor can lead to different places with new threats, so the tension is constant. The scary thing is not being alone in the dark. It's not being alone in the dark.

The puzzles will be a recurring mechanic and the keys to solving them are in the details. Your observation capacity and your ingenuity will be rewarded. But often to fail can mean suffering a fateful fate.

Shadows of Duat rewards exploration, as the labyrinthine paths of the tomb hold many secrets, curiosities, and even unique items.

There is no single way to end this adventure. There are multiple endings that you will be able to see depending on your decisions. Choose wisely, because the life or death of the characters and even the fate of humanity will depend on it.

highlighted.name: Under the wings of the Triad

content_descriptors.notes: It is a horror game where mummies, zombies and plagues of insects appear. There is abundant blood and sometimes the main character suffers a violent death, the result of the game's own action. It is not something too explicit nor do we recreate it.

name: Shadows of Duat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 3.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 7700X 8-Core 4.50 GHz or better
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: An old school survival horror set in Egypt. An indie game with the essence of the classics of the genre, but modern gameplay, with realistic graphics and immersive sound. A difficult and terrifying challenge only for the bravest. No one will hear your screams from inside the tomb.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
